dc.title: U.S. Border Patrol: Jobs Opportunities securing America's Borders
dc.description: The U.S. Border Patrol is the nation's first line of defense. Its job is to detect, prevent, & apprehend terrorists, criminals, drug traffickers, as well as illegal immigrants who attempt to enter the United States.
